company_info.name: Siebert Financial Corporation
company_info.description: Siebert Financial Corporation is a diversified U.S. financial services firm offering a comprehensive range of solutions for individual investors, corporate clients, and institutions. Its services include full-service and self-directed brokerage, online and professional trading across equities, fixed income, ETFs, structured products, and margin lending; personalized financial advice and wealth management with portfolio construction, monitoring, and long-term financial planning; investment banking and capital markets services such as capital raising, underwriting, and M&A advisory; corporate services including equity compensation and stock plan administration; access to a broad set of investment products such as bonds, CDs, IPOs, and alternative instruments; as well as insurance and protection solutions delivered through affiliated partners. Through the integration of technology, advisory expertise, and education, Siebert aims to provide end-to-end financial solutions tailored to diverse investment needs.
company_info.usp: End-to-end financial solutions combining technology, advisory expertise, and financial education for diverse investment needs

pain_points: Complexity of financial products and services
Difficulty navigating investment decisions without advice

voice_info.tone: Empowering, inclusive, and aspirational. The tone should feel like listening to a charismatic, knowledgeable friend: confident, vibrant, and trustworthy. Communication should be conversational, clear, and engaging, never condescending, never overly corporate.
dos: Use clear, concise language and short sentences
Speak in the first person ('we') when referring to the brand
Prioritize clarity, empowerment, and trust over promotion
donts: Use jargon unless strictly necessary, and always explain it
Never provide direct financial advice, only observations, education, or opinion

examples_do: Understanding ETFs doesn't have to be complicated. Here's what you need to know.
We believe everyone deserves access to smart financial tools.

content.visual_assets: Photography focused on real people, real stories, and authentic moments. Strong typographic statements, editorial-style layouts, and bold graphic elements. Recurring references include founder legacy, cultural trailblazers, everyday financial journeys, and clear educational visuals.

content.positioning: A heritage financial firm that combines the trust and expertise of a full-service institution with the accessibility and innovation of modern fintech
strengths: Unique founder legacy (Muriel Siebert, first woman on NYSE)
Full spectrum of services from self-directed to full-service
Strong commitment to financial education and inclusivity
Personal advisory relationships, not just algorithmic
weaknesses: Smaller brand recognition compared to Schwab/Fidelity
opportunities: Position as the empowering, inclusive alternative to big-box brokerages
Leverage founder story for brand differentiation
Content-driven education to build trust with younger investors

trends: Rise of self-directed investing among millennials/Gen Z
